description:
Makoto is invited to lunch at the Maekawa residence. While playing games with Maekawa-san, Makoto is told that he`s "good at giving up on things" by Maekawa-san. This revives sour memories. Then, Makoto goes to a basketball game to cheer on Ryuuko, but...
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Kotoshi no Natsu wa Basket to Chounouryoku to Futon to Tentaikansoku to Matsuri to Yakyuu to Meme-tan to
This Summer Is Basketball, Psychic Powers, Stargazing and More - Plus Meme-tan!
今年の夏はバスケと超能力と布団と天体観測と祭りと野球と女々(めめ)たんと
